definitions.definition: To expand or extend to an excessive degree, especially to do so beyond a safe limit; to overreach .
To apply (a term) to too many referents, by overextension .
To push a pawn too far, so that it becomes vulnerable to the opponent 's attacks .

main_definition: To expand or extend to an excessive degree, especially to do so beyond a safe limit; to overreach .
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics , transitive ) To apply (a term) to too many referents, by overextension .
( chess , transitive ) To push a pawn too far, so that it becomes vulnerable to the opponent 's attacks .
